TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebClient extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 提供從 URI 所識別的資源中，傳送與接收資料的常見方法。

span.span: Provides common methods for sending data to and receiving data from a resource identified by a URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 我們不建議您改用`WebClient`開發新的類別。We don't recommend that you use the `WebClient` class for new development. 請改用類別。Instead, use the class. 類別提供常見的方法，將資料傳送到或接收任何本機、 內部網路或網際網路資源 URI 所識別的資料。The class provides common methods for sending data to or receiving data from any local, intranet, or Internet resource identified by a URI. 類別會使用類別，以提供資源的存取權。The class uses the class to provide access to resources. 執行個體可以存取資料的任何子系向方法。 instances can access data with any descendant registered with the method. > [!NOTE] > 根據預設，.NET Framework 支援以開頭的 Uri `http:`， `https:`， `ftp:`，和`file:`配置識別碼。By default, the .NET Framework supports URIs that begin with `http:`, `https:`, `ftp:`, and `file:` scheme identifiers. 下表描述方法將資料上傳到資源。The following table describes methods for uploading data to a resource. |方法Method|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| ||擷取用來將資料傳送至資源。Retrieves a used to send data to the resource.| ||擷取用來將資料傳送至資源，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Retrieves a used to send data to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||將位元組陣列傳送至資源，並傳回陣列，包含任何回應。Sends a byte array to the resource and returns a array containing any response.| ||傳送的資源，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒的陣列。Sends a array to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||將本機檔案傳送至資源，並傳回陣列，包含任何回應。Sends a local file to the resource and returns a array containing any response.| ||本機將檔案傳送至資源，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Sends a local file to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||傳送資源，然後傳回陣列，包含任何回應。Sends a to the resource and returns a array containing any response.| ||傳送資源，然後傳回陣列，包含任何回應，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Sends a to the resource and returns a array containing any response, without blocking the calling thread.| ||傳送的資源，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Sends a to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||傳送的資源，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Sends a to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| 下表描述從資源下載資料的方法。The following table describes methods for downloading data from a resource. |方法Method|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| ||傳回的資料，從做為資源。Returns the data from a resource as a .| ||從資源中，傳回的資料，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Returns the data from a resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||從資源下載資料，並傳回陣列。Downloads data from a resource and returns a array.| ||從資源下載資料，並傳回陣列，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Downloads data from a resource and returns a array, without blocking the calling thread.| ||從資源的資料下載到本機檔案中。Downloads data from a resource to a local file.| ||資料從資源下載至本機檔案，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Downloads data from a resource to a local file, without blocking the calling thread.| ||下載資源，並傳回從。Downloads a from a resource and returns a .| ||下載從資源，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Downloads a from a resource, without blocking the calling thread.| 您可以使用方法來取消非同步作業，但尚未完成。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. A執行個體不會傳送預設的選擇性 HTTP 標頭。A instance does not send optional HTTP headers by default. 如果您的要求需要的選擇性標頭，您必須新增此標頭以集合。If your request requires an optional header, you must add the header to the collection. 例如，若要保留在回應中的查詢，您必須新增使用者代理程式標頭。For example, to retain queries in the response, you must add a user-agent header. 此外，伺服器可能會遺漏使用者代理標頭時傳回 500 （內部伺服器錯誤）。Also, servers may return 500 (Internal Server Error) if the user agent header is missing. 設定為`true`在執行個體。 is set to `true` in instances. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會採用資源的 URI、 擷取它，並顯示回應。The following code example takes the URI of a resource, retrieves it, and displays the response. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientUserAgent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientUserAgent/CPP/useragent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientUserAgent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientUserAgent/CS/useragent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientUserAgent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientUserAgent/VB/useragent.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式建立的新執行個體類別。The default constructor creates a new instance of the class. 預設的 HTTP 方法為 GET。The default HTTP method is GET. 預設 FTP 方法是 RETR。The default FTP method is RETR. 預設的 是 。The default is . 的預設值為 `true`。The default value of is `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立執行個體，並接著會使用它從伺服器下載資料，並顯示在 [系統] 主控台，以從伺服器下載資料並寫入至檔案，並上載到伺服器的表單值並接收回應。The following code example creates a instance and then uses it to download data from a server and display it on the system console, to download data from a server and write it to a file, and to upload form values to a server and receive the response. [!code-cpp[WebClient#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient/CPP/webclient.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient/CS/webclient.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient/VB/webclient.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否要為 執行個體緩衝處理從網際網路資源讀取的資料。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to buffer the data read from the Internet resource for a instance.

value.span: 表示要對從網際網路資源接收的資料啟用緩衝處理， 則表示要停用緩衝處理。

span.span: to enable buffering of the data received from the Internet resource; to disable buffering.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性是`true`，使它能讀取應用程式在記憶體中緩衝資料。When the property is `true`, the data is buffered in memory so it is ready to be read by the app.

value.span: 若要啟用緩衝處理寫入網際網路資源的資料，則為 ；若要停用緩衝處理，則為 。

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性是`true`，因此它在較大的區塊中的網際網路資源可以更有效率地撰寫在記憶體中緩衝資料。When the property is `true`, the data is buffered in memory so it can be written more efficiently to the Internet resource in larger chunks.

summary.span: 取得或設定由 要求的基底 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets the base URI for requests made by a .

value.span: ，包含 所提出之要求的基底 URI；如果未指定基底位址 (Base Address)，則為 。

span.span: A containing the base URI for requests made by a or if no base address has been specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含結合的相對位址的基底 URI。The property contains a base URI that is combined with a relative address. 當您呼叫的方法，會將上傳或下載資料，物件會結合此基底 URI 與您在方法呼叫中指定的相對位址。When you call a method that uploads or downloads data, the object combines this base URI with the relative address you specify in the method call. 如果您指定的絕對 URI不會使用屬性值。If you specify an absolute URI, does not use the property value. 若要移除先前的設定值，請將此屬性設定為`null`或空字串 ("")。To remove a previously set value, set this property to `null` or an empty string (""). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會從網際網路伺服器下載資料，並顯示在主控台上。The following code example downloads data from an Internet server and displays it on the console. 它假設伺服器的位址 (例如http://www.contoso.com)處於`hostUri`和所用的資源 （例如 /default.htm) 路徑`uriSuffix`。It assumes that the server's address (such as http://www.contoso.com) is in `hostUri` and that the path to the resource (such as /default.htm) is in `uriSuffix`. [!code-cpp[WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders/CPP/webclient_baseaddress_responseheaders.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders/CS/webclient_baseaddress_responseheaders.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_BaseAddress_ResponseHeaders/VB/webclient_baseaddress_responseheaders.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取消暫止的非同步作業。

span.span: Cancels a pending asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果作業已暫止，這個方法會呼叫於基礎。If an operation is pending, this method calls on the underlying . 當您呼叫，您的應用程式仍會接收與作業相關聯的完成事件。When you call , your application still receives the completion event associated with the operation. 例如，當您呼叫取消作業，如果您指定的事件處理常式事件，事件處理常式會接收結束作業的通知。For example, when you call to cancel a operation, if you have specified an event handler for the event, your event handler receives notification that the operation has ended. 若要深入了解作業是否順利完成，請檢查屬性的基底類別上資料物件傳遞至事件處理常式的事件中。To learn whether the operation completed successfully, check the property on the base class of in the event data object passed to the event handler. 如果任何非同步作業不正在進行中，這個方法任何作用。If no asynchronous operation is in progress, this method does nothing.

summary.span: 取得或設定傳送至主機並用於驗證要求的網路認證。

span.span: Gets or sets the network credentials that are sent to the host and used to authenticate the request.
An containing the authentication credentials for the request.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含用來存取主機上的資源的驗證認證。The property contains the authentication credentials used to access a resource on a host. 在大部分的用戶端案例中，您應該使用，這是目前登入使用者的認證。In most client-side scenarios, you should use the , which are the credentials of the currently logged on user. 若要這樣做，請設定屬性設`true`而不是設定這個屬性。To do this, set the property to `true` instead of setting this property. 如果類別用於中介層應用程式，ASP.NET 應用程式，例如屬於執行 ASP 頁面 （伺服器端的認證） 的帳戶。If the class is being used in a middle tier application, such as an ASP.NET application, the belong to the account running the ASP page (the server-side credentials). 一般而言，您會設定此屬性代表其提出要求的用戶端的認證。Typically, you would set this property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made. 基於安全性理由，會自動遵循重新導向時，儲存的認證，您想要包含在中的重新導向並將它指派給這個屬性。For security reasons, when automatically following redirects, store the credentials that you want to be included in the redirect in a and assign it to this property. 這個屬性會自動設定為`null`在重新導向，如果它包含以外的項目時。This property will automatically be set to `null` upon redirection if it contains anything except a . 具有這個屬性值自動設定為`null`在這些情況下不會將認證傳送至任何非預期的目的地。Having this property value be automatically set to `null` under those conditions prevents credentials from being sent to any unintended destination. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用使用者的系統認證來驗證要求。The following code example uses the user's system credentials to authenticate a request. [!code-cpp[WebClientAuthentication#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClientAuthentication/CPP/webclientauth.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClientAuthentication#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClientAuthentication/CS/webclientauth.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClientAuthentication#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClientAuthentication/VB/webclientauth.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法所指定的 URI 下載資源`address`參數。The method downloads the resource with the URI specified by the `address` parameter. 這個方法會封鎖下載的資源時。This method blocks while downloading the resource. 若要下載的資源，並繼續執行等候伺服器的回應時，使用其中一種方法。To download a resource and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用 FTP 資源下載試命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會從伺服器要求資料，並顯示傳回的資料。The following code example requests data from a server and displays the data returned. 它假設`remoteUri`包含有效的 URI 所要求資料。It assumes that `remoteUri` contains a valid URI for the requested data. [!code-cpp[WebClient_DownloadData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_DownloadData/CPP/webclient_downloaddata.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_DownloadData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_DownloadData/CS/webclient_downloaddata.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_DownloadData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_DownloadData/VB/webclient_downloaddata.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取指定的資源中指定的 URI 配置相關聯的通訊協定使用的預設方法`address`。This method retrieves the specified resource using the default method for the protocol associated with the URI scheme specified in `address`. 以非同步方式使用執行緒集區的 自動配置的執行緒資源下載資料。The data is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 這個方法不會在下載的資源時封鎖呼叫執行緒。This method does not block the calling thread while downloading the resource. 若要下載的資源和區塊，等候伺服器的回應時，使用其中一種方法。To download a resource and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 當下載完成就會引發事件。When the download completes, the event is raised. 您的應用程式必須處理這個事件，以接收通知。Your application must handle this event to receive notification. 下載的資料位於屬性。The downloaded data is available in the property. 您可以使用方法來取消非同步作業，但尚未完成。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. 此方法會使用 FTP 資源下載試命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 在非同步資料下載作業完成時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous data download operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次非同步資料下載作業完成的時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous data download operation completes. 藉由呼叫啟動非同步資料下載方法。Asynchronous data downloads are started by calling the methods. 是此事件的委派。The is the delegate for this event. 類別會提供事件處理常式與事件資料。The class provides the event handler with event data. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定此事件的事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件會完成之後已下載的資料資源。The returned object will complete after the data resource has been downloaded. 這個方法會擷取指定的資源中指定的 URI 配置相關聯的通訊協定使用的預設方法`address`參數。This method retrieves the specified resource using the default method for the protocol associated with the URI scheme specified in the `address` parameter. 以非同步方式使用執行緒集區的 自動配置的執行緒資源下載資料。The data is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用 FTP 資源下載試命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 下列程式碼範例會從伺服器要求資料，並顯示傳回的資料。The following code example requests data from a server and displays the data returned. 它假設`remoteUri`包含有效的 URI 所要求資料。It assumes that `remoteUri` contains a valid URI for the requested data.

span.span: Downloads the resource with the specified URI to a local file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會下載到本機檔案資料中所指定的 URI 從`address`參數。The method downloads to a local file data from the URI specified by in the `address` parameter. 這個方法會封鎖下載的資源時。This method blocks while downloading the resource. 若要下載的資源，並繼續執行等候伺服器的回應時，使用其中一種方法。To download a resource and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用 FTP 資源下載試命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 在中介層應用程式，例如 ASP.NET 頁面上，使用此方法時您會收到錯誤，如果應用程式執行所在的帳戶沒有存取檔案的權限。When using this method in a middle tier application, such as an ASP.NET page, you will receive an error if the account under which the application executes does not have permission to access the file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會下載檔案，以從http://www.contoso.com到本機硬碟。The following code example downloads a file from http://www.contoso.com to the local hard drive. [!code-cpp[WebClient_DownloadFile#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_DownloadFile/CPP/webclient_downloadfile.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_DownloadFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_DownloadFile/CS/webclient_downloadfile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_DownloadFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_DownloadFile/VB/webclient_downloadfile.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會下載的資源中所指定的 URI`address`參數。This method downloads the resource at the URI specified by in the `address` parameter. 下載成功完成時，已下載的檔案會命名為`fileName`本機電腦上。When the download completes successfully, the downloaded file is named `fileName` on the local computer. 以非同步方式使用執行緒集區的 自動配置的執行緒資源下載的檔案。The file is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 使用檔案時，收到通知，加入事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the file is available, add an event handler to the event. 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，資源會在下載時。This method does not block the calling thread while the resource is being downloaded. 若要封鎖等候下載完成時，使用其中一種方法。To block while waiting for the download to complete, use one of the methods. 您可以使用方法來取消非同步作業，但尚未完成。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未指定絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not specify an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用 FTP 資源下載試命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 當 ASP.NET 網頁中使用此方法，您會收到錯誤，如果執行該網頁的帳戶沒有存取本機檔案的權限。When using this method in an ASP.NET page, you will receive an error if the account that the page executes under does not have permission to access the local file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次非同步檔案下載作業完成的時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous file download operation completes. 藉由呼叫啟動非同步檔案下載方法。Asynchronous file downloads are started by calling the methods. 是此事件的委派。The is the delegate for this event. 類別會提供事件處理常式與事件資料。The class provides the event handler with event data. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定此事件的事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件會完成之後已下載的資料資源。The returned object will complete after the data resource has been downloaded. 這個方法會下載的資源中所指定的 URI`address`參數。This method downloads the resource at the URI specified by in the `address` parameter. 下載成功完成時，已下載的檔案會命名為`fileName`本機電腦上。When the download completes successfully, the downloaded file is named `fileName` on the local computer. 以非同步方式使用執行緒集區的 自動配置的執行緒資源下載的檔案。The file is downloaded asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 您可以使用方法來取消非同步作業，但尚未完成。You can use the method to cancel asynchronous operations that have not completed. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未指定絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not specify an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用 FTP 資源下載試命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 當 ASP.NET 網頁中使用此方法，您會收到錯誤，如果執行該網頁的帳戶沒有存取本機檔案的權限。When using this method in an ASP.NET page, you will receive an error if the account that the page executes under does not have permission to access the local file.

summary.span: 在非同步下載作業成功傳輸部分或全部資料時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous download operation successfully transfers some or all of the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次非同步下載取得進展時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous download makes progress. 使用下列方法之一啟動下載項目時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised when downloads are started using any of the following methods. |方法Method|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| ||從資源下載資料，並傳回陣列，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Downloads data from a resource and returns a array, without blocking the calling thread.| ||資料從資源下載至本機檔案，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Downloads data from a resource to a local file, without blocking the calling thread.| ||從資源中，傳回的資料，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Returns the data from a resource, without blocking the calling thread.| 是此事件的委派。The is the delegate for this event. 類別會提供事件處理常式與事件資料。The class provides the event handler with event data. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 被動 FTP 檔案傳輸一律會顯示進度百分比為零，因為伺服器未傳送的檔案大小。A passive FTP file transfer will always show a progress percentage of zero, since the server did not send the file size. 若要顯示進度，您可以變更 FTP 連接為作用中藉由覆寫虛擬方法：To show progress, you can change the FTP connection to active by overriding the virtual method: ```csharp internal class MyWebClient : WebClient { protected override WebRequest GetWebRequest(Uri address) { FtpWebRequest req = (FtpWebRequest)base.GetWebRequest(address); req.UsePassive = false; return req; } } ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定此事件的事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#19)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#19)] 下列程式碼範例會顯示此事件處理常式的實作。The following code example shows an implementation of a handler for this event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取指定的資源。This method retrieves the specified resource. 下載資源之後，會使用此方法中指定的編碼要轉換的資源屬性。After it downloads the resource, the method uses the encoding specified in the property to convert the resource to a . 這個方法會封鎖下載的資源時。This method blocks while downloading the resource. 若要下載的資源，並繼續執行等候伺服器的回應時，使用其中一種方法。To download a resource and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用 FTP 資源下載試命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#25](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#25)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#25](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#25)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#25)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取指定的資源。This method retrieves the specified resource. 下載資源之後，會使用此方法中指定的編碼要轉換的資源屬性。After it downloads the resource, the method uses the encoding specified in the property to convert the resource to a . 這個方法會封鎖下載的資源時。This method blocks while downloading the resource. 若要下載的資源，並繼續執行等候伺服器的回應時，使用其中一種方法。To download a resource and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用 FTP 資源下載試命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

value.span: ，包含與這個要求相關聯的標頭名稱/值組合。

span.span: A containing header name/value pairs associated with this request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含執行個體，包含通訊協定標頭，與要求一起傳送。The property contains a instance containing protocol headers that the sends with the request. 某些常見的標頭會被視為限制和保護的系統和無法設定或變更在物件。Some common headers are considered restricted and are protected by the system and cannot be set or changed in a object. 任何嘗試將其中一個受限制的標頭中設定相關聯的物件物件將會擲回例外狀況之後，嘗試傳送要求。Any attempt to set one of these restricted headers in the object associated with a object will throw an exception later when attempting to send the request. 保護系統的受限制的標頭包括但不限於下列：Restricted headers protected by the system include, but are not limited to the following: - 日期Date - 主機Host 此外，某些其他標頭也會限制使用時物件。In addition, some other headers are also restricted when using a object. 這些限制的標頭包括但不限於下列：These restricted headers include, but are not limited to the following: - 接受Accept - 連線Connection - Content-LengthContent-Length - 預期 (當此值設定為"100-繼續 」Expect (when the value is set to "100-continue" - If-Modified-SinceIf-Modified-Since - 範圍Range - Transfer-EncodingTransfer-Encoding 類別的屬性可以設定上述的標頭部分。The class has properties for setting some of the above headers. 如果它是很重要的應用程式設定這些標頭，則應該用於類別，而不是類別。If it is important for an application to set these headers, then the class should be used instead of the class. 您不應該假設的標頭值會維持不變，因為 Web 伺服器和快取可能會變更或新增至 Web 要求的標頭。You should not assume that the header values will remain unchanged, because Web servers and caches may change or add headers to a Web request. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用集合來設定 HTTP`Content-Type`標頭`application/x-www-form-urlencoded,`通知表單資料的伺服器附加到貼文。The following code example uses the collection to set the HTTP `Content-Type` header to `application/x-www-form-urlencoded,` to notify the server that form data is attached to the post. [!code-cpp[WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers/CPP/webclient_uploaddata_headers.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers/CS/webclient_uploaddata_headers.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData_Headers/VB/webclient_uploaddata_headers.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繼承自這個類別的類別可以覆寫此方法，以執行其他工作時就會發生事件。Classes that inherit from this class can override this method to perform additional tasks when the event occurs. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md) 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範衍生自的類別可以自訂此方法的實作。The following code example shows an implementation of this method that can be customized by a class derived from . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立用來讀取所指定之資源的內容執行個體`address`參數。The method creates a instance used to read the contents of the resource specified by the `address` parameter. 這個方法會封鎖在開啟資料流時。This method blocks while opening the stream. 若要繼續執行在等待資料流時，使用其中一種方法。To continue executing while waiting for the stream, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是`null`，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not `null`, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用 FTP 資源下載試命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 您必須呼叫完成時以避免系統資源不足。You must call when finished with the to avoid running out of system resources. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟所識別的資源`uriString`，並在系統主控台顯示結果。The following code example opens the resource identified by `uriString` and displays the results on the system console. 請注意，所傳回在讀取資料時，會關閉。Note that the returned by is closed when the data has been read. [!code-cpp[WebClient_OpenRead#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_OpenRead/CPP/webclient_openread.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_OpenRead#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_OpenRead/CS/webclient_openread.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_OpenRead#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_OpenRead/VB/webclient_openread.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取用來存取所指定的資源執行個體`address`參數。This method retrieves a instance used to access the resource specified by the `address` parameter. 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源取得資料流。The stream is obtained using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要使用資料流時，收到通知，加入事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the stream is available, add an event handler to the event. > [!NOTE] > 您必須呼叫當您已完成以避免系統資源不足。You must call when you are finished with the to avoid running out of system resources. 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，而在開啟資料流。This method does not block the calling thread while the stream is opening. 若要封鎖等待資料流時，請使用方法。To block while waiting for the stream, use the method. 您可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未指定絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求之資源的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not specify an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested resource. 如果屬性不是`null`，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not `null`, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用 FTP 資源下載試命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回之後才會完成物件已開啟可讀取的資料流，資料資源。The returned object will complete after the a readable stream to the data resource has been opened. 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，而在開啟資料流。This method does not block the calling thread while the stream is opening. 這個方法會擷取用來存取所指定的資源執行個體`address`參數。This method retrieves a instance used to access the resource specified by the `address` parameter. 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源取得資料流。The stream is obtained using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. > [!NOTE] > 您必須呼叫當您已完成以避免系統資源不足。You must call when you are finished with the to avoid running out of system resources. 您可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未指定絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求之資源的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not specify an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested resource. 如果屬性不是`null`，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not `null`, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用 FTP 資源下載試命令。This method uses the RETR command to download an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 GET 方法。For an HTTP resource, the GET method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回寫入的資料流，用來將資料傳送至資源。The method returns a writable stream that is used to send data to a resource. 這個方法會封鎖在開啟資料流時。This method blocks while opening the stream. 若要繼續執行在等待資料流時，使用其中一種方法。To continue executing while waiting for the stream, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用上傳 prostředek FTP STOR 命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會從命令列讀取資料，並使用取得用於將資料寫入的資料流。The following code example reads data from the command line and uses to obtain a stream for writing the data. 請注意，所傳回傳送資料之後關閉。Note that the returned by is closed after the data is sent. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回寫入的資料流，用來將資料傳送至資源。The method returns a writable stream that is used to send data to a resource. 提出基礎的要求中指定的方法與`method`參數。The underlying request is made with the method specified in the `method` parameter. 當您關閉資料流時，資料會傳送到伺服器。The data is sent to the server when you close the stream. 這個方法會封鎖在開啟資料流時。This method blocks while opening the stream. 若要繼續執行在等待資料流時，使用其中一種方法。To continue executing while waiting for the stream, use one of the methods. 如果`method`參數會指定不了解伺服器基礎的通訊協定類別可讓您判斷發生何種狀況的方法。If the `method` parameter specifies a method that is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常會擲回屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`未指定絕對位址，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not specify an absolute address, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會從命令列讀取資料，並使用取得用來寫入資料的資料流。The following code example reads data from the command line and uses to obtain a stream used to write the data. 請注意，所傳回必須關閉，以將資料傳送。Note that the returned by must be closed to send the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取用來將資料傳送至資源的可寫入資料流。This method retrieves a writable stream that is used to send data to a resource. 使用從執行緒集區便會自動配置的執行緒資源擷取資料流。The stream is retrieved using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要使用資料流時，收到通知，加入事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the stream is available, add an event handler to the event. 當您關閉資料流時，封鎖執行緒，直到要求傳送至`address`和收到的回應。When you close the stream, the thread blocks until the request is sent to `address` and a response is received. 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，而正在開啟資料流。This method does not block the calling thread while the stream is being opened. 若要封鎖等待資料流時，使用其中一種方法。To block while waiting for the stream, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用上傳 prostředek FTP STOR 命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取用來將資料傳送至資源的可寫入資料流。This method retrieves a writable stream that is used to send data to a resource. 以非同步方式使用執行緒集區的 自動配置的執行緒資源擷取資料流。The stream is retrieved asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要使用資料流時，收到通知，加入事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the stream is available, add an event handler to the event. 當您關閉資料流時，資料流的內容會傳送到伺服器。The contents of the stream are sent to the server when you close the stream. 如果`method`參數會指定不了解伺服器基礎的通訊協定類別可讓您判斷發生何種狀況的方法。If the `method` parameter specifies a method that is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常會擲回屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 您可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，而正在開啟資料流。This method does not block the calling thread while the stream is being opened. 若要封鎖等待資料流時，使用其中一種方法。To block while waiting for the stream, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 在開啟資料流以將資料寫入資源的非同步作業完成時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous operation to open a stream to write data to a resource completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次開啟用來將資料傳送至資源資料流的非同步作業完成的時，會引發此事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous operation to open a stream that is used to send data to a resource completes. 這些作業會開始藉由呼叫方法。These operations are started by calling the methods. 是此事件的委派。The is the delegate for this event. 類別會提供事件處理常式與事件資料。The class provides the event handler with event data. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定此事件的事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件之後，才會完成資料資源的可寫入資料流已開啟。The returned object will complete after the a writable stream to the data resource has been opened. 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，而在開啟資料流。This method does not block the calling thread while the stream is opening. 這個方法會擷取用來將資料寫入至所指定的資源執行個體`address`參數。This method retrieves a instance used to write data to the resource specified by the `address` parameter. 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源取得資料流。The stream is obtained using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. > [!NOTE] > 您必須呼叫當您已完成以避免系統資源不足。You must call when you are finished with the to avoid running out of system resources. 您可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用上傳 prostředek FTP STOR 命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會識別執行個體進行通訊的遠端伺服器，這代表物件。The property identifies the instance that communicates with remote servers on behalf of this object. Proxy 是由使用組態檔和 Internet Explorer 區域網路設定的系統設定。The proxy is set by the system using configuration files and the Internet Explorer Local Area Network settings. 若要指定任何 proxy，應使用，請設定屬性設`null`。To specify that no proxy should be used, set the property to `null`. 如需有關自動 proxy 偵測，請參閱[自動 Proxy 偵測](~/docs/framework/network-programming/automatic-proxy-detection.md)。For information on automatic proxy detection, see [Automatic Proxy Detection](~/docs/framework/network-programming/automatic-proxy-detection.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含包含附加至查詢字串為 URI 的名稱/值組的執行個體。The property contains a instance containing name/value pairs that are appended to the URI as a query string. 內容屬性前面會加上問號 （？），並會以連字號分隔從另一個名稱/值組 (&)。The contents of the property are preceded by a question mark (?), and name/value pairs are separated from one another by an ampersand (&). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會從命令列的使用者輸入，並建置指派給屬性。The following code example takes user input from the command line and builds a that is assigned to the property. 然後下載回應，從伺服器的本機檔案。It then downloads the response from the server to a local file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將資料緩衝區傳送到資源。The method sends a data buffer to a resource. 此方法會使用上傳 prostředek FTP STOR 命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. 如果伺服器不了解基礎的要求，基礎的通訊協定類別會決定要執行的功能。If the underlying request is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常會擲回屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 方法會將傳送的內容`data`至伺服器，且不予以編碼。The method sends the content of `data` to the server without encoding it. 這個方法會封鎖上傳資料時。This method blocks while uploading the data. 若要繼續執行等候伺服器的回應時，使用其中一種方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將主控台，以從輸入字串的轉換陣列，並將張貼到指定的伺服器時使用陣列。The following code example converts a string entered from the console to a array and posts the array to the specified server using . 任何來自伺服器的回應會顯示到主控台。Any response from the server is displayed to the console. [!code-cpp[WebClient_UpLoadData2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData2/CPP/webclient_uploaddata2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebClient_UpLoadData2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData2/CS/webclient_uploaddata2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebClient_UpLoadData2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebClient_UpLoadData2/VB/webclient_uploaddata2.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將資料緩衝區傳送至使用中指定的 HTTP 方法，以資源`method`參數，並從伺服器傳回任何回應。The method sends a data buffer to a resource using the HTTP method specified in the `method` parameter, and returns any response from the server. 這個方法會封鎖上傳資料時。This method blocks while uploading the data. 若要繼續執行等候伺服器的回應時，使用其中一種方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 方法會將傳送的內容`data`至伺服器，且不予以編碼。The method sends the content of `data` to the server without encoding it. 如果`method`參數指定的動詞，而不了解伺服器基礎的通訊協定類別可讓您判斷發生何種狀況。If the `method` parameter specifies a verb that is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常會擲回屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將從主控台輸入的位元組陣列的字串轉換，並張貼到指定的伺服器時使用陣列。The following code example converts a string entered from the console into a byte array and posts the array to the specified server using . 任何來自伺服器的回應會顯示到主控台。Any response from the server is displayed to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將資料緩衝區傳送到資源。This method sends a data buffer to a resource. 資料緩衝區會以非同步方式使用執行緒集區的 自動配置的執行緒資源。The data buffer is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 未編碼的資料。The data is not encoded. 若要接收通知，資料上傳完成時，加入事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the data upload completes, add an event handler to the event. 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，而正在傳送的資料。This method does not block the calling thread while the data is being sent. 若要在等候伺服器的回應時傳送資料和區塊，使用其中一種方法。To send data and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 您可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("")，並`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用上傳 prostředek FTP STOR 命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 使用指定的方法並辨識語彙基元 (Token)，將資料緩衝區上載至由 URI 識別的資源。

span.span: Uploads a data buffer to a resource identified by a URI, using the specified method and identifying token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將資料緩衝區傳送到資源。This method sends a data buffer to a resource. 資料緩衝區會以非同步方式使用執行緒集區的 自動配置的執行緒資源。The data buffer is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 未編碼的資料。The data is not encoded. 若要接收通知，資料上傳完成時，加入事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the data upload completes, add an event handler to the event. 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，而正在傳送的資料。This method does not block the calling thread while the data is being sent. 若要在等候伺服器的回應時傳送資料和區塊，使用其中一種方法。To send data and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 您可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("")，並`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 在非同步資料上載作業完成時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous data-upload operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次非同步資料上載作業完成的時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous data upload operation completes. 藉由呼叫啟動非同步資料上載方法。Asynchronous data uploads are started by calling the methods. 是此事件的委派。The is the delegate for this event. 類別會提供事件處理常式與事件資料。The class provides the event handler with event data. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定此事件的事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#36](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#36)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#36](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#36)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#36](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#36)]

summary.span: 使用工作物件，以非同步作業的方式，將包含 陣列的資料緩衝區上傳至指定的 URI。

span.span: Uploads a data buffer that contains a array to the URI specified as an asynchronous operation using a task object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件之後，才會完成資料緩衝區已上傳到資源。The returned object will complete after the a data buffer has been uploaded to the resource. 這個方法會將資料緩衝區傳送到資源。This method sends a data buffer to a resource. 資料緩衝區會以非同步方式使用執行緒集區的 自動配置的執行緒資源。The data buffer is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 未編碼的資料。The data is not encoded. 您可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("")，並`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用上傳 prostředek FTP STOR 命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會將本機檔案傳送到資源。The method sends a local file to a resource. 此方法會使用上傳 prostředek FTP STOR 命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. 這個方法會封鎖上傳檔案時。This method blocks while uploading the file. 若要繼續執行等候伺服器的回應時，使用其中一種方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. `POST` HTTP 所定義方法。The `POST` method is defined by HTTP. 如果基礎的要求不會使用 HTTP 和`POST`不了解伺服器基礎的通訊協定類別可讓您判斷發生何種狀況。If the underlying request does not use HTTP and `POST` is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常會擲回屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將指定的檔案上傳至指定的 URI 使用。The following code example uploads the specified file to the specified URI using . 由伺服器傳回任何回應會顯示在主控台上。Any response returned by the server is displayed on the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式傳送檔案。The file is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要接收通知，檔案上傳完成時，加入事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the file upload completes, add an event handler to the event. 這個方法會在傳送檔案時，不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。This method does not block the calling thread while the file is being sent. 若要在等候伺服器的回應時傳送的檔案和區塊，使用其中一種方法。To send a file and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 您可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("")，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用上傳 prostředek FTP STOR 命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式傳送檔案。The file is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要接收通知，檔案上傳完成時，加入事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the file upload completes, add an event handler to the event. 這個方法會在傳送檔案時，不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。This method does not block the calling thread while the file is being sent. 若要在等候伺服器的回應時傳送的檔案和區塊，使用其中一種方法。To send a file and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 您可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("")，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用上傳 prostředek FTP STOR 命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式傳送檔案。The file is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要接收通知，檔案上傳完成時，加入事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the file upload completes, add an event handler to the event. 這個方法會在傳送檔案時，不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。This method does not block the calling thread while the file is being sent. 若要在等候伺服器的回應時傳送的檔案和區塊，使用其中一種方法。To send a file and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 您可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("")，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用上傳 prostředek FTP STOR 命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

Public Custom Event UploadFileCompleted As UploadFileCompletedEventHandler

member this.UploadFileCompleted : System.Net.UploadFileCompletedEventHandler

summary.span: 在非同步檔案上載作業完成時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous file-upload operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次非同步檔案上傳作業完成的時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous file upload operation completes. 藉由呼叫啟動非同步檔案上載方法。Asynchronous file uploads are started by calling the methods. 是此事件的委派。The is the delegate for this event. 類別會提供事件處理常式與事件資料。The class provides the event handler with event data. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定此事件的事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#4)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件會完成之後檔案已上傳到資源。The returned object will complete after the file has been uploaded to the resource. 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式傳送檔案。The file is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 您可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("")，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用上傳 prostředek FTP STOR 命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件會完成之後檔案已上傳到資源。The returned object will complete after the file has been uploaded to the resource. 使用執行緒集區的自動配置的執行緒資源，以非同步方式傳送檔案。The file is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 您可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("")，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 根據預設，此方法會使用上傳 prostředek FTP STOR 命令。BY default, this method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 在非同步上傳作業成功傳輸部分或全部資料時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous upload operation successfully transfers some or all of the data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次非同步上傳取得進展時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous upload makes progress. 使用下列方法之一啟動上傳時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised when uploads are started using any of the following methods. |方法Method|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| ||傳送的資源，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒的陣列。Sends a array to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||本機將檔案傳送至資源，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Sends a local file to the resource, without blocking the calling thread.| ||傳送資源，然後傳回陣列，包含任何回應，而不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。Sends a to the resource and returns a array containing any response, without blocking the calling thread.| 是此事件的委派。The is the delegate for this event. 類別會提供事件處理常式與事件資料。The class provides the event handler with event data. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定此事件的事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#4)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#4)] 下列程式碼範例會顯示此事件處理常式的實作。The following code example shows an implementation of a handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#42](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#42)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#42](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#42)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#42)]

returns.span: ，其中包含由伺服器傳送的回應。

span.span: A containing the response sent by the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 上傳之前的字串，這個方法將它轉換成陣列使用中指定的編碼屬性。Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a array using the encoding specified in the property. 會在傳輸字串時，就會封鎖這個方法。This method blocks while the string is transmitted. 若要將字串傳送，並繼續執行等候伺服器的回應時，使用其中一種方法。To send a string and continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("")，並`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string (""), and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用上傳 prostředek FTP STOR 命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將字串傳送至的資源。This method sends a string to a resource. 字串會以非同步方式使用執行緒集區的 自動配置的執行緒資源。The string is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 上傳之前的字串，這個方法將它轉換成陣列使用中指定的編碼屬性。Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a array using the encoding specified in the property. 在字串上傳完成時，收到通知，您可以將加入的事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the string upload completes, you can add an event handler to the event. 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，該字串會在傳送時。This method does not block the calling thread while the string is being sent. 若要在等候伺服器的回應時傳送字串和區塊，使用其中一種方法。To send a string and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 您可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用上傳 prostředek FTP STOR 命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

span.span: The HTTP method used to send the file to the resource.

param.span: 如果是 Null，預設的 HTTP 為 POST，而 FTP 則為 STOR。

span.span: If null, the default is POST for http and STOR for ftp.

param.name: data
param.span: 要上傳的字串。

span.span: The string to be uploaded.

summary.span: 將指定的字串上傳至指定的資源。

span.span: Uploads the specified string to the specified resource.

summary.span: 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒。

span.span: This method does not block the calling thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將字串傳送至的資源。This method sends a string to a resource. 字串會以非同步方式使用執行緒集區的 自動配置的執行緒資源。The string is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 上傳之前的字串，這個方法將它轉換成陣列使用中指定的編碼屬性。Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a array using the encoding specified in the property. 在字串上傳完成時，收到通知，您可以將加入的事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the string upload completes, you can add an event handler to the event. 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，該字串會在傳送時。This method does not block the calling thread while the string is being sent. 若要在等候伺服器的回應時傳送字串和區塊，使用其中一種方法。To send a string and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 您可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 在非同步字串上傳作業完成時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous string-upload operation completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次非同步字串上傳作業完成的時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous string upload operation completes. 藉由呼叫啟動非同步字串上傳方法。Asynchronous string uploads are started by calling the methods. 是此事件的委派。The is the delegate for this event. 類別會提供事件處理常式與事件資料。The class provides the event handler with event data. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定此事件的事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates setting an event handler for this event. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#38)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#38)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件會完成之後已上傳至資源的字串。The returned object will complete after the string has been uploaded to the resource. 字串會以非同步方式使用執行緒集區的 自動配置的執行緒資源。The string is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 您可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 上傳之前的字串，這個方法將它轉換成陣列使用中指定的編碼屬性。Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a array using the encoding specified in the property. 會在傳輸字串時，就會封鎖這個方法。This method blocks while the string is transmitted. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法傳送到伺服器。The method sends a to a server. 這個方法會封鎖上傳資料時。This method blocks while uploading the data. 若要繼續執行等候伺服器的回應時，使用其中一種方法。To continue executing while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 如果伺服器不了解基礎的要求，基礎的通訊協定類別會決定要執行的功能。If the underlying request is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常會擲回屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果內容類型標頭`null`，則方法將它設定為"application/x-www-表單-urlencoded"。If the Content-type header is `null`, the method sets it to "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用上傳 prostředek FTP STOR 命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會從 （名稱、 年齡和地址） 的使用者收集資訊和張貼到伺服器時使用的值。The following code example gathers information from the user (name, age, and address) and posts the values to the server using . 任何來自伺服器的回應會顯示在主控台上。Any response from the server is displayed on the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將字串傳送至的資源。This method sends a string to a resource. 字串會以非同步方式使用執行緒集區的 自動配置的執行緒資源。The string is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 上傳之前的字串，這個方法將它轉換成陣列使用中指定的編碼屬性。Before uploading the string, this method converts it to a array using the encoding specified in the property. 在字串上傳完成時，收到通知，您可以將加入的事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the string upload completes, you can add an event handler to the event. 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，該字串會在傳送時。This method does not block the calling thread while the string is being sent. 若要在等候伺服器的回應時傳送字串和區塊，使用其中一種方法。To send a string and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 您可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用上傳 prostředek FTP STOR 命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
