remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳送中包含的資料至`address`資源。This method sends the data contained in a to the `address` resource. 使用這個方法，將表單資料傳送至 URI，以進行處理。Use this method to send form data to a URI for processing. 使用表單 url 方式進行編碼的媒體類型，來傳送資料內容類型標頭值必須設定為"application/x-www-表單-urlencoded"。The data is sent using the form-urlencoded media type; the Content-Type header value must be set to "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". 根據預設，標頭已經正確設定。The header is set correctly by default. 方法會擲回如果您呼叫此方法使用不同內容類型標頭值組中集合。The methods throw a if you call this method with a different Content-Type header value set in the collection. 如果`method`方法不了解伺服器基礎的通訊協定類別可讓您判斷發生何種狀況。If the `method` method is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常會擲回屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 傳送以非同步方式使用執行緒集區的 自動配置的執行緒資源。The is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 若要上傳作業完成時，收到通知，將新增事件處理常式事件。To receive notification when the upload operation completes, add an event handler to the event. 這個方法不會封鎖呼叫執行緒，該字串會在傳送時。This method does not block the calling thread while the string is being sent. 若要在等候伺服器的回應時傳送字串和區塊，使用其中一種方法。To send a string and block while waiting for the server's response, use one of the methods. 您可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空的它會附加至`address`。If the property is not empty, it is appended to `address`. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會引發這個事件每次的非同步上傳完成物件的資料。This event is raised each time an asynchronous upload of a object's data completes. 藉由呼叫啟動這些上載方法。These uploads are started by calling the methods. 是此事件的委派。The is the delegate for this event. 類別會提供事件處理常式與事件資料。The class provides the event handler with event data. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件會完成之後已上傳至資源的名稱/值集合。The returned object will complete after the name/value collection has been uploaded to the resource. 名稱/值集合是傳送以非同步方式使用執行緒集區的 自動配置的執行緒資源。The name/value collection is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 您可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果伺服器不了解基礎的要求，基礎的通訊協定類別會決定要執行的功能。If the underlying request is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常會擲回屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果內容類型標頭`null`，這個方法將它設定為"application/x-www-表單-urlencoded"。If the Content-type header is `null`, this method sets it to "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用上傳 prostředek FTP STOR 命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 使用工作物件，以非同步作業的方式將指定的名稱/值集合上傳至指定之 URI 所識別的資源。

span.span: Uploads the specified name/value collection to the resource identified by the specified URI as an asynchronous operation using a task object.

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件上的 屬性會傳回包含伺服器所傳送之回應的 陣列。

span.span: The property on the task object returns a array containing the response sent by the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件會完成之後已上傳至資源的名稱/值集合。The returned object will complete after the name/value collection has been uploaded to the resource. 名稱/值集合是傳送以非同步方式使用執行緒集區的 自動配置的執行緒資源。The name/value collection is sent asynchronously using thread resources that are automatically allocated from the thread pool. 您可以使用取消尚未完成的非同步作業方法。Asynchronous operations that have not completed can be canceled using the method. 如果伺服器不了解基礎的要求，基礎的通訊協定類別會決定要執行的功能。If the underlying request is not understood by the server, the underlying protocol classes determine what occurs. 通常會擲回屬性設定為表示發生錯誤。Typically, a is thrown with the property set to indicate the error. 如果內容類型標頭`null`，這個方法將它設定為"application/x-www-表單-urlencoded"。If the Content-type header is `null`, this method sets it to "application/x-www-form-urlencoded". 如果屬性不是空字串 ("") 和`address`不包含絕對 URI，`address`必須是相對 URI，並結合了形成要求資料的絕對 URI。If the property is not an empty string ("") and `address` does not contain an absolute URI, `address` must be a relative URI that is combined with to form the absolute URI of the requested data. 如果屬性不是空字串，它會附加至`address`。If the property is not an empty string, it is appended to `address`. 此方法會使用上傳 prostředek FTP STOR 命令。This method uses the STOR command to upload an FTP resource. 對於 HTTP 資源，可使用 POST 方法。For an HTTP resource, the POST method is used. > [!NOTE] > 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 中的網路追蹤](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`true`當要求所做的變更物件應該如果要求的伺服器上，驗證使用目前登入使用者的預設認證。Set this property to `true` when requests made by this object should, if requested by the server, be authenticated using the default credentials of the currently logged on user. 用戶端應用程式，這是在大部分情況下想要的行為。For client applications, this is the desired behavior in most scenarios. 對於中介層應用程式，例如 ASP.NET 應用程式，而不是使用這個屬性，您通常設定屬性，以代表其提出要求的用戶端的認證。For middle tier applications, such as ASP.NET applications, instead of using this property, you would typically set the property to the credentials of the client on whose behalf the request is made. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates setting this property. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#3)]

summary.span: 在使用寫入資料流以將資料寫入資源的非同步作業已關閉時發生。

span.span: Occurs when an asynchronous operation to write data to a resource using a write stream is closed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次非同步作業，用來將資料寫入至資源，使用寫入資料流已關閉時，會引發這個事件。This event is raised each time an asynchronous operation used to write data to a resource using a write stream is closed. 這些作業因呼叫方法。These operations result from calls to the methods. 是此事件的委派。The is the delegate for this event. 類別會提供事件處理常式與事件資料。The class provides the event handler with event data. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
